<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scamper Underfoot](/Feats.aspx?ID=1218) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shoony" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=296" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 72</row>

</column>

---

You are used to ducking under foes and can scurry around the battlefield with ease. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) checks to [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29) the spaces of Medium or larger enemies, and the presence of an enemy doesn’t make the squares difficult terrain.

<title level="2">Scamper Underfoot leads to...</title>
[Tough Tumbler](/Feats.aspx?ID=1222)
name: Scamper Underfoot
